title: Twitter/X social card preview

description: Ensure player hover tooltips in the recruiting diamond don't get cut off at edges.

title: Bulk actions in watchlist
description: Allow coaches to select multiple players and perform bulk actions (move status, export, message).

title: Empty states for all sections
description: Add friendly empty states with illustrations and CTAs for all empty lists.

title: Implement pagination for player lists
description: Add pagination or infinite scroll to player search results to handle large result sets.

title: Supabase realtime for notifications
description: Set up realtime subscriptions for in-app notifications (new message, profile view, etc).

title: Coach Interest Heatmap
description: Players don't know which coaches are actively looking at their profiles or when. A visual heatmap showing coach activity, view patterns, and interest levels helps players understand their recruiting momentum.
acceptance_criteria: Tracks and stores coach profile views, time spent, return visits
Creates visual heatmap showing geographic interest (map view)
Shows temporal patterns (when coaches are most active)
Displays interest score based on engagement metrics
Includes coach tier indicators (D1, D2, D3)
Adds 'hot prospects' notifications when interest spikes
Integrates with existing analytics and creates new database tables for tracking

title: Video Analysis Tools
description: Static videos don't provide enough insight for coaches evaluating players. Interactive video tools with frame-by-frame analysis, annotations, and comparison features enhance scouting capabilities.
acceptance_criteria: Adds video player with frame-by-frame controls and slow motion
Enables coaches to add timestamped annotations and highlights
Supports side-by-side video comparison for multiple players
Includes drawing tools for technique analysis
Allows sharing of annotated video clips
Provides video statistics (view time, replay frequency)
Integrates with existing video upload system and adds annotation database tables

title: Smart Profile Completion Coach
description: Many player profiles are incomplete, reducing visibility to coaches. A smart completion system with progress tracking and personalized suggestions will increase profile quality and engagement.
acceptance_criteria: Calculates profile completion percentage based on filled fields (basic info, stats, videos, bio, photos)
Shows a progress bar in the dashboard
Displays smart suggestions like 'Add your batting average to attract more coaches'
Uses a sliding panel with actionable CTAs
Tracks completion milestones and celebrates achievements
Integrates with existing profile forms and validation

title: Quick Action Toolbar
description: Users waste time navigating between pages for common actions. A persistent quick action toolbar provides one-click access to frequently used features like search, messages, and watchlist management.
acceptance_criteria: Floats as a dismissible sidebar or bottom bar
Shows unread message count with preview
Provides watchlist quick-add for any player
Includes keyboard shortcuts (Cmd+K for search, Cmd+M for messages)
Adapts based on user role (coach vs player actions)
Uses React Portal for positioning and integrates with existing state management

title: Smart Message Templates
description: Coaches send similar introduction and follow-up messages repeatedly. Smart templates with dynamic personalization save time while maintaining authentic communication.
acceptance_criteria: Provides pre-built templates for common scenarios (initial contact, camp invitations, follow-ups)
Supports dynamic variables like {{player_name}}, {{position}}, {{school}} that auto-populate
Allows custom template creation and sharing
Integrates with existing message composer and stores templates in database

title: Recruitment Timeline Tracker
description: Both coaches and players lose track of recruitment progress across multiple prospects. A visual timeline showing key milestones, next steps, and deadlines keeps everyone organized.
acceptance_criteria: Shows visual timeline with key events (first contact, campus visit, offer, decision)
Allows both coaches and players to add timeline entries
Includes milestone templates (official visit, transcript sent, etc.)
Shows upcoming deadlines and next steps
Supports file attachments for each timeline entry
Includes reminder notifications for important dates
Creates new database schema for timeline events and relationships

title: Performance Trends Dashboard
description: Static stats don't show player development over time. A trends dashboard with visual charts and improvement tracking helps players showcase growth and helps coaches identify rising talent.
acceptance_criteria: Creates line charts showing stat progression over time
Highlights significant improvements with callout badges
Compares player performance to position averages
Includes goal tracking and milestone celebrations
Supports multiple sports and custom metrics
Integrates with existing stats system and creates trend calculation logic

title: Campus Visit Coordinator
description: Coordinating campus visits involves complex scheduling between multiple parties. An integrated visit planner streamlines the entire process from invitation to itinerary management.
acceptance_criteria: Enables coaches to send visit invitations with available date ranges
Allows players to request visits and propose dates
Generates detailed itineraries with campus activities
Includes travel planning with hotel/flight suggestions
Tracks visit outcomes and follow-up tasks
Integrates with calendar systems and creates visit management database schema
Includes visit feedback and rating system

title: Smart Notification Digest
description: Users get overwhelmed by individual notifications or miss important updates. A smart digest system groups related notifications and delivers them at optimal times based on user behavior.
acceptance_criteria: Groups related notifications (all coach views, message clusters)
Learns optimal delivery times from user activity patterns
Provides digest frequency options (immediate, hourly, daily)
Includes smart summaries like '3 new coach views this week'
Supports rich email templates with action buttons
Integrates with existing notification system and adds user preference management

title: Competitive Intelligence Hub
description: Coaches need to understand the competitive landscape for recruits. A intelligence hub showing which other schools are recruiting the same players helps inform strategy and timing.
acceptance_criteria: Shows which other coaches are viewing/messaging the same players
Displays recruiting competition level for each prospect
Provides market insights (average offer timing, success rates)
Includes anonymous benchmarking against similar programs
Respects privacy while providing useful aggregate data
Integrates with existing analytics and creates competitive tracking system

title: AI Recruiting Assistant
description: Coaches spend hours manually searching and filtering players. An AI assistant that learns coach preferences and proactively suggests matching players would save massive time and improve recruiting success rates.
acceptance_criteria: Tracks coach search patterns, watchlist additions, and message history
Uses OpenAI API to analyze coach preferences (position, location, stats, graduation year)
Runs daily batch job to score all players against coach preferences
Shows top 5 recommended players with reasoning
Add 'Not interested' feedback to improve recommendations
Store coach preferences in new table with ML scoring weights
Add to coach dashboard as expandable AI panel

title: Natural Language Search
description: Current search requires users to learn filters and interfaces. Natural language search ('show me catchers in Florida graduating 2025') would make the platform more intuitive and powerful.
acceptance_criteria: Replace current search input with intelligent search bar
Use OpenAI API to parse queries into structured filters
Extract: position, location, graduation year, stats criteria, handedness
Show interpreted filters as chips below search bar for confirmation
Add example searches as placeholder text
Fall back to traditional keyword search if AI parsing fails
Add voice search using Web Speech API
Cache common query patterns to reduce API calls

title: Quick Action Overlays
description: Users currently need multiple clicks to perform common actions. Hover overlays with instant actions (add to watchlist, quick message, view stats) would make the platform feel much more responsive and premium.
acceptance_criteria: On hover, show floating action bar with icons for: watchlist toggle, quick message, view full profile, compare
Use Tailwind hover states and absolute positioning
Add keyboard shortcuts (W for watchlist, M for message)
Implement optimistic updates for instant feedback
Add subtle animations using CSS transforms
Ensure mobile-friendly with tap-and-hold on touch devices

title: Smart Profile Completion
description: Many player profiles are incomplete, reducing their chances of being discovered. A gamified completion system with progress bars, achievement badges, and feature unlocks would drive engagement and improve profile quality.
acceptance_criteria: Add ProfileCompletionCard component to player dashboard
Calculate completion percentage based on: profile photo, bio, stats, videos, contact info, academic info
Show progress bar and 'X of 8 sections complete'
List missing items with direct links to edit forms
Unlock features: messaging at 60%, appear in search at 40%
Store completion_score in player table, update on profile changes
Add celebration animation when milestones reached

title: Player Comparison Matrix
description: Coaches need to compare multiple players but currently must open separate tabs and manually track differences. A side-by-side comparison tool would streamline decision-making and look highly professional.
acceptance_criteria: Add 'Compare' checkbox to all player cards that adds to comparison state
Show floating comparison bar with selected players (max 4)
Create /compare route with side-by-side player cards
Display stats in comparison table with color coding (green for highest, red for lowest)
Include videos with synchronized playback controls
Add export to PDF functionality using jsPDF
Use React Context for comparison state management

title: Smart Scheduling Assistant
description: Coaches waste time coordinating visits and calls across timezones. An intelligent scheduling system that suggests optimal times, detects conflicts, and handles timezone conversion would eliminate scheduling friction.
acceptance_criteria: Add timezone detection and storage in user profiles
Build SchedulingAssistant component that suggests meeting times based on both users' availability
Integrate with calendar events to detect conflicts
Add 'Schedule Call' button to messages that opens smart scheduling modal
Show suggested times in both users' timezones
Calculate travel time for in-person visits using Google Maps API
Send calendar invites via email with timezone conversion
Store scheduling preferences (morning person, weekends ok, etc.)
Use external calendar integration (Google/Outlook) to check real availability

title: Activity Stream Intelligence
description: Users miss important updates and interactions. A smart activity feed that highlights relevant actions, groups related activities, and sends intelligent notifications would keep users engaged and informed.
acceptance_criteria: Create activities table to track: profile views, watchlist adds, messages, stat updates, video uploads
Build ActivityFeed component with grouped, chronological activities
Add smart grouping ('3 coaches viewed your profile today')
Add notification preferences (email digest, push notifications)
Implement real-time updates using WebSockets or polling
Add activity indicators (red dot) to main navigation
Create different activity types with custom icons and messages
Add privacy controls (who can see you viewed their profile)
Include quick actions in activity items (reply to message, view profile)

title: One-Click Export Suite
description: Coaches need to create reports and share data with staff but currently must screenshot or manually compile information. Professional export options (PDF reports, CSV data, presentation slides) would save hours and look impressive.
acceptance_criteria: Add ExportManager utility class with methods for PDF, CSV, and image exports
Use jsPDF for PDF generation with custom templates (player reports, recruiting summaries)
Add CSV export for watchlists and search results with all player data
Create branded PDF templates with coach/school logos
Add export buttons to key components with dropdown options
Generate shareable links for exported content
Add bulk export options (export all watchlisted players)
Compress large exports to ZIP files
Track export analytics to see most popular formats

title: Message Templates & Smart Replies
description: Coaches send similar messages repeatedly (initial interest, follow-ups, camp invites). Smart templates with personalization and suggested replies would save significant time and ensure consistent communication quality.
acceptance_criteria: Add template dropdown in the message composer with categories: 'Initial Interest', 'Follow-up', 'Camp Invitation', 'Scholarship Offer'
Add ability to save custom templates and set favorites
Include quick reply buttons for common responses
Allow template sharing between coaches at same institution
Add message scheduling for optimal send times
Include email signature templates with coach credentials
